thread.section_title: Parcel Monkey USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parcel Monkey USA | parcelmonkey.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Parcel Monkey USA reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: The delivery took the least amount of days estimated and it was easy to follow the tracking on the website. I wish I would have the ability to have tracking updates sent to my phone or computer so I didn't have to continue to log back in to see where the package was in the process. I had someone waiting to deliver it on the other end so I had to continue to monitor the PM website for updates. Perhaps I missed this function and could have had the updates sent to me? All in all, I will definitely use this service again and have already told others about it as well.
